sen.j: 持明院 基久（じみょういん もとひさ、天正12年（1584年） - 慶長20年5月7日 (旧暦)（1615年6月3日））は、安土桃山時代から江戸時代初期の公家。
sen.e: Motohisa JIMYOIN (1584 – June 3, 1615) was a court noble who was active during the period since the Azuchi Momoyama period until the early Edo period.
Motohisa JIMYOIN (1584 – June 3, 1615) was a court noble who was active from the Azuchi Momoyama period until the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: 「～時代から」にあたる部分を改めました。
sen.e: Motohisa JIMYOIN (1584 – June 3, 1615) was a court noble who was active from the Azuchi Momoyama period until the early Edo period.

sen.j: 官位は従四位上、左近衛権中将。
sen.e: He served as Jushii-jo Sakone no Gon no chujo (lieutenant general of the inner palace guard at junior fourth rank, upper grade).
sen.cmt: 左近衛権中将…さこんえのごんのちゅうじょう

sen.j: 正親町季秀の子で、持明院基孝の養子。
sen.e: His natural father was Suehide OGIMACHI; Motohisa was adopted by Mototaka JIMYOIN.

sen.j: 妹に持明院基子（後陽成天皇典侍、了性院）。
sen.e: His younger sister Motoko JIMYOIN served Emperor Goyozei as Naishi no suke (handmaid) and was called Ryoseiin (or Ryoshoin).

sen.j: 子女は、持明院基征、河鰭基秀（河鰭公虎のちの西洞院時慶養子）、富小路頼直（富小路秀直養子）、持明院基定室。
sen.e: Among his children, Motoyuki JIMYOIN, Motohide KAWABATA (Kimitora KAWABATA) who was adopted by Tokiyoshi NISHINOTOIN, Yorinao TOMIKOJI who was adopted by Hidenao TOMIKOJI, and a daughter who became the wife of Motosada JIMYOIN, are known.

sen.j: 公家の身分でありながら、子の基征とともに大坂の役に参加し大坂城に入城し、最終決戦の天王寺・岡山の戦いで戦死した。
sen.e: In spite of his status as the noble, he and his son Motoyuki joined in the Siege of Osaka, and protected the Osaka-jo Castle until he was killed in the last battle at Tennoji Okayama in 1615.

sen.j: また一説には落ち延びたが同年5月28日に没したともいわれている。
sen.e: Some historian says that he could escape with his bare life and died May 28 of the same year.

sen.j: 高家旗本・大沢基宿の次男持明院基定が基久の娘の婿となり、名跡を継ぐことを許された。
sen.e: The Jimyoin family was forgiven the continuance, then, Motosada JIMYOIN, the second son of Motoie OSAWA who was one of Koke Hatamoto (direct retainers of the bakufu, who were in a privileged family under Tokugawa Shogunate), married a daughter of Motohisa and inherited the Jimyoin family.
